course_description: Focuses on the complexity of policy problems surrounding international environmental issues, the fragility of international environmental institutions, and specific policy problems such as free trade, sustainable development, population growth, climate change, and endangered species.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131 or ENVS_ OX 131 or POLS 110 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 6443, Section #: 9000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Staff, Status: Closed
